attributes.action: Grant a National Holiday when the Brexit issue is finally resolved.
attributes.background: The issues around Brexit have been wearing and divisive for the Nation.  We need to come together and better way to do it but for the Government - whoever they are when the issue is finally resolved - to grant a National Holiday, or better still a four day Bank Holiday weekend.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "finally resolved."

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the circumstances you think would warrant a bank holiday.
